name: Anxiolytics and Hypnotics: Average Daily Quantity per patient
title: Anxiolytics and Hypnotics: Average Daily Quantity per item per 1000 patients
description: Number of average daily quantities (ADQs) per 1000 patients
numerator_from: {hscic}.normalised_prescribing_standard p  LEFT JOIN {hscic}.presentation r  ON p.bnf_code = r.bnf_code
